PAYMENT: 
Pay Pal is the only method of payment which I accept. With Pay Pal, you may pay with a debit or credit card, an eCheck from a checking account or you may pay from a Pay Pal account balance. Payments must clear Pay Pal first before your item is shipped. If you cannot pay through Pay Pal, please do not purchase items.

SHIPPING: 
Shipping includes tracking & confirmation through the USPS. I use only the USPS for shipping.

I combine shipping & handling! Save by purchasing multiple items.

QUESTIONS: 
Please ask all questions before purchasing items. Please read item descriptions carefully. If the description does not contain information you are looking for, please send me a message through the "contact" link below before purchasing any item.

name: 100 Sheets Recycled Kraft Cardstock - 100% PCW
description:
100 Sheets Paper Kraft Cardstock - nice size for handmade cards & die cuts - ECO FRIENDLY

PAPERBOARD COLOR & WEIGHT: 
Brown kraft both sides - 12 pt.

RECYCLED SPECS: 100% recycled 

APPROXIMATE DIMENSIONS:
8 1/2" Long X 6 1/8" Wide 
(please see photos for presentation of dimensions)

FEATURES:
♥ sized nice for handmade cards
♥ high recycled content which is themed well for natural, eco friendly, green friendly, earth friendly, country, rustic and primitive items

BULK QUANTITY DISCOUNTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR THIS ITEM.  If you are interested in bulk pricing for higher quantities, please contact us using the "Contact" link at the bottom of this page. 

PLEASE NOTE:
Please check the dimensions carefully to help ensure that these will make a good fit for your projects. Products are not returnable for size, color or weight issues. You may purchase a sample pack in the event you would like to test for size, color, quality and weight. See additional ads for sample packs or inquire for samples using the "Contact" link at the bottom of this page.

name: Two sheets of Handmade Paper - Kraft - 4 3/4" X 6 1/2"
description:
Two sheets of my handmade paper made from recycled kraft paper products.

I re-use all of the scraps leftover from my paper projects.  I grind down into pulp and use the standard paper making process with my handcrafted screens to create these great little sheets of paper.

Each sheets measures approximately 4 3/4" X 6 1/2".

Each sheet will vary in weight since the paper is handmade.

The edges are rough reflecting the true handcrafted process.  If you need a clean sheet, the edges can be easily trimmed.

These are great sheets for turning into small book covers, card fronts, tags, die cuts or any other project requiring an eco-friendly and handcrafted touch.

Please allow 3-5 business days for preparation of this product.  I make sheets as they are ordered.

Need a larger sheet?  See additional ads for sheets larger in width and length.

name: 3 D Skeleton Key made from recycled kraft paper
description:
This is one of my favorite reycled molded paper projects.

The key measures approximately 4 3/8" X 1 3/4"
(measured from the widest and longest points)
The depth will vary since each key is handcrafted by pressing into a mold.  The approximate depth is 1/2"

I use my leftover kraft paper scraps and grind down into pulp to re-use for my 3D mold paper projects.

These are great for turning into Christmas tree ornaments.  make a hole in the end of the key for ribbon or string.  Then, simply paint, apply glitter or add your own creative touch, add your ribbon or string and it is ready to give as a gift or adorn your own tree.  Also great as embellishments for gifts.

Need another theme?  See additional ads for other 3 D recycled paper molded objects.
